summary: Replaces some of Skyrim\'s music with tracks from Oblivion
descriptionHtml:
As much as I love Skyrim and it\'s music, I find that I miss the memorable tunes from Oblivion. I have replaced some of the exploring music that I found to be a bit dull or repetitive. All of the exploring music from Oblivion is contained. 

Here is the list of changed music:

mus_explore_day_01 - Minstrels Lament
mus_explore_day_03 - Wings of Kynareth
mus_explore_day_05 - Glory of Cyrodiil
mus_explore_dusk_01 - Through the Valleys
mus_explore_dusk_03 - Peace of Akatosh
mus_explore_night_06 - Auriels Ascension
mus_explore_night_01 - King and Country

Just extract the rar into your data folder.
author: Tiranno
